data.text: @WilliamdeVry1 @YahooNews Robin was one human/celeb I truly wished to have met, to have had a conversation with him would’ve been such a great honour. Loved his humour but always saw something deeper that I connected with. Died a yr after my mom. Touching video! ❤️. Thankyou for sharing.
@WilliamdeVry1 @YahooNews Oh how do you make it through that video without 😭
@WilliamdeVry1 @YahooNews Awww that’s so sad. RIP KOKO!🙁
